name: Gatowormo
description:
Gatowormo, A cat-worm hybrid creature capable of throwing Dice, consuming Cheezburger, and fighting Rats. Although created by the pinnacle of science, they still get Hairballs.

Suck / Blow your way out of waves of rats and monstrous bosses!

Controls :

Hold Left Mouse Button to Suck!
Press Right Mouse Button to Fire!

T to toggle Suction Toggle Mode!

Feeling hopeless? Hold Escape to leave your current run!

Out of ammo? Keep Sucking until you get a hairball, FREE AMMO!

Gatowormo is a mini Rogue-Like game, 3 Bosses, only 4 different enemy types for now, and a few pickups to power you up along the way.

All art/programming by me HGJake.

Most sounds were made by me as well, However, some audio was provided by the Youtube Audio Library.

Music by Tallbeard.
